props.name: avatar
props.description: Agent avatar (image URL or ReactNode icon)

props.name: description
props.description: Agent description (max 2 lines with ellipsis). Space is always reserved

props.name: isMultiAgent
props.description: When true, shows a "Multi" badge indicating this is a multi-agent.

props.name: availableFolders
props.description: Available folders the agent can be moved to

props.name: onMoveToFolder
props.description: Called when user selects a folder to move this agent

examples.title: Basic agent card
examples.code:
<AgentCard
  id="agent-1"
  avatar="https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=1"
  title="Customer Support Agent"
  description="AI-powered assistant for customer support"
  timestamp="Updated 2 hours ago"
/>

examples.title: With status badge
examples.code:
<AgentCard
  id="agent-2"
  avatar={<Bot size={32} />}
  title="Sales Assistant"
  description="Qualified leads and schedules demos"
  timestamp="Updated today"
  status="published"
/>

examples.code:

  timestamp="Updated yesterday"
  onClick={() => console.log('View details')}
  onEdit={() => console.log('Edit agent')}
  onDelete={() => console.log('Delete agent')}
/>
